quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "You had me sold at 'smushy'."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "We've been watching you through the IP cameras. No, seriously we sit at home and watch you all night long for hours. What? It's not creepy."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "I would have a class on buttocks, but Red wouldn't let me do it. But i'm the chair now!"

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "What I really want you to do is attach wires to your body. I don't know why, but I do."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "You’re all coming to class naked next week!"

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "You know, schizophrenics can tickle themselves."

quote.author: Xuedi
quote.text: "Idk, what Im doing!"

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "If you’re watching Shiffman alone on the couch, you’ve got a problem."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "I think latex is something you should all have your mind on."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "Turn-ons: free shipping."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "Girls who can run in heels should be feared."

quote.author: GOD
quote.text: "Once you accept that nothing makes sense, everything makes sense."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "Buy drugs, not Uggs."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "The thing about your pregnant wife is that your wife isn't important, it's that she's pregnant."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "Real friendship is when your friend comes over to your house and then you both just take a nap."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "shoutout to mozzarella sticks, pizza, cheese fries, + tacos. love u guys!"

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "I'm an atheist. There, I said it."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "Your buttocks could move like a potentiometer!"

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "Boobs and genitals are different temperatures from the rest of your body."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "If your project has a butt in it, it automatically makes it on this list."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "You can only bring sexy back if u have the receipt."

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "Plot twist: He likes you back."

quote.author: Truman Capote
quote.text: "The good thing about masturbation is that you don't have to get dressed up for it."

quote.author: Vonna Bonta
quote.text: "Sex in space is not just a good idea, it's survival."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: (On being replaced by an artificial intelligence...) "As an introvert I think removing people is a good idea."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "Mobile programming, like wireless, is full of misery."

quote.author: John Brunner
quote.text: "It’s supposed to be automatic, but actually you have to push this button."

quote.author: Pablo Picasso
quote.text: "Computers are useless. They can only give you answers."

quote.author: Clay Shirky
quote.text: "It’s not information overload. It’s filter failure."

quote.author: Clay Shirky
quote.text: "We have lived in this world where little things are done for love and big things for money. Now we have Wikipedia. Suddenly big things can be done for love."

quote.author: Alice Kahn
quote.text: "For a list of all the ways technology has failed to improve the quality of life, please press three."

quote.author: Unknown
quote.text: "I won't be impressed with technology until I can download food."

quote.author: Steve Wozniak
quote.text: "Never trust a computer you can’t throw out a window."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "Gaffers tape is something you should bow down in front of."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "Another of the greatest substances in the world is zip ties."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "Does anyone have the weirdest of all dongles?"

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "I've found most of the women's undergarments are cheap."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "There is a day — if your thing is about to be unveiled at The Whitney — you should use something else besides hot glue."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "If you built this into underwear, you’d make millions." (on a wearable vibration motor)

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: (on your thesis) "I don’t think you have to worry about this being practical."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "If you're a hacker, hacking your body is a nice thing. But come talk to me before you stick anything in your orifices."

quote.author: DanO
quote.text: "In all seriousness...the buttocks should be the prime focus of this class. It is truly under-represented.”

quote.author: Tina
quote.text: "Homework to do: hella. homework I've done: negative hella."

quote.author: Clay Shirky
quote.text: "One of the best ways to know you're completely wrong, is to behave as if you're complete right.”
